original_text:
CandyBlasted
Una magica terra, una realtà fatta solo di caramelle, zucchero e dolcetti: praticamente è come trovarsi in un paradiso! Ti basta questo dettaglio per iniziare subito a giocare a CandyBlasted? O forse non è abbastanza? E allora aggiungiamo una serie di dettagli interessanti che ti faranno venire l’acquolina in bocca: la slot ti offre la possibilità di sfruttare un moltiplicatore che arriva fino a 10x. Quando un giocatore si avvicina a questa macchinetta online firmata da High5Games potrà raggruppare e raccogliere tra le 5 e le 100 caramelle che sono utili per incrementare le ricchezze che porterà a casa terminata la sua esperienza di gioco. Scopriremo tutto ciò che c’è da sapere su tale game, partendo dalle sue caratteristiche grafiche, fino ad arrivare alle animazioni e funzioni speciali che presenta. 
Grafica e simboli di gioco
Parlare di CandyBlasted iniziando dalla sua grafica non è la cosa più semplice da fare, va ammesso. Siamo all’interno di un universo parallelo dove una bellissima favola dal gusto dolce sta per essere raccontata. La prima cosa sorprendente è la struttura stessa della sua griglia: il gioco si svolge su una struttura 10×10 ricoperta di prelibate caramelle che possono diventare importanti vittorie. I simboli che pagano maggiormente sono quelli che hanno dimensioni più grandi, disegnati in modo molto semplice e pulito. Troviamo quindi nell’ordine il quadrato rosa, il diamante rosso passando poi per il triangolo verde, i dolci esagonali arancioni e molto altro ancora. La seconda stravaganza è quella legata al Jolly che non esiste! Al suo posto è stata inserita una stellina che diventa una sorta di guida durante la tua permanenza nel gioco. Prima di avviare la slot dimentica tutto ciò che sai o hai visto fare dalle case di produzione più famose che operano nel settore online: ecco, questo è CandyBlasted!
Il gameplay di questa slot è tutta una sorpresa che risulta molto più facile da capire giocando che da scoprire a parole. L’obiettivo è di raggruppare simboli uguali per andare a formare delle combo fortunate. Se si verificheranno delle combinazioni multiple allora potrai ammirare simboli diversi trasformarsi negli stessi che hanno appena realizzato la serie vincente. Ma in che modo aumentano i tuoi guadagni? Ovviamente con i moltiplicatori: pensiamo, per esempio, a Swirly Flamboyant Candy che può avere un valore pari a 2x, 3x, 5x, 7x o 10x.
Altra funzione importante per la buona riuscita del gioco è la Candy Planet Bonus che ti porta 12 giri gratuiti il cui premio può arrivare a 100 volte la tua scommessa per singolo giro.
Considerazioni finali sulla slot CandyBlasted
CandyBlasted non si presenta come una delle slot più semplici del panorama di gioco online, ma giro dopo giro risulta più facile notare la sua vera semplicità e apprezzare il livello di entertainment. Non è sicuramente un titolo ideale per chi cerca storie misteriose e ricche di tesori nascosti, ma è pur sempre una macchinetta interessante per le possibilità che presenta.
Ha inoltre un RTP fissato al 95,90% che è in linea con la media delle slot online: insomma vale la pena fare qualche giro di prova e lasciarsi trasportare da questa dolce magia.

raw_translation.response:
Step into a magical world made entirely of candy, sugar, and sweets – the ultimate paradise for any gambler with a sweet tooth. CandyBlasted, designed by High5Games, offers players the chance to increase their riches with a multiplier up to 10x. Gather between 5 and 100 candies as you spin the reels, and discover all the game's graphic features, animations and special functions.
The game's 10x10 grid is filled with colorful and delicious symbols, with bigger symbols paying out more. Forget about traditional Wild symbols – CandyBlasted offers a guiding star that will lead you through the gameplay. With its unique mechanics, the game's objective is to gather matching symbols to create winning combos. Multiple combinations will see diverse symbols transform into the ones that created the winning series. Multipliers like the Swirly Flamboyant Candy, with values of 2x, 3x, 5x, 7x or 10x, will help boost your profits. The Candy Planet Bonus feature rewards players with 12 free spins, with the possibility of winning up to 100 times their initial bet per spin.
CandyBlasted may not be the simplest game out there, but it's a true entertainment delight. Don't expect a mysterious storyline or hidden treasures – what you can anticipate is a sweet ride. With an RTP fixed at 95.90%, it's worth giving this slot a few spins and relishing in its sweet magic.

response.headline: Exploring CandyBlasted's Delicious Gameplay Mechanics and Sweet Symbols
response.content:
CandyBlasted is a thrilling casino slot game that's sure to satisfy any sweet tooth. It's all about grouping identical symbols on a 10x10 grid to create winning combinations that can lead to multiplying your winnings. With multipliers like 'Swirly Flamboyant Candy', you can really see the sugar rush kick in as you watch your winnings pour in.

The symbols themselves are just as yummy as you'd expect, with delicious treats like candy canes, jelly beans, and gumballs lighting up the reels. Each symbol has its value, and with each spin, you'll be hoping to land the perfect combination to get those coins raining down. However, it's not just about the individual symbols; you'll want to take advantage of the Candy Planet Bonus as well.

The Candy Planet Bonus is a standout feature in this game and can provide players with a ton of free spins. You can land up to 12 free spins and a potential payout of up to 100x your initial bet for each spin. That's a whole lot of candy you could be walking away with! Just be sure to channel your inner Willy Wonka and cross your fingers for the golden ticket to this sweet bonus round.

One thing you won't find in CandyBlasted is your typical wild symbol. Instead, a star acts as a guiding light for players throughout the game. While it may not replace other symbols, its bright and shining presence can help you on your quest for that big win. Who needs a wild symbol when you have a lucky star on your side?

Overall, CandyBlasted is a delightful and entertaining slot game that'll leave you reaching for the candy jar. Each spin is full of excitement and potential, and with the Candy Planet Bonus, you'll have plenty of chances to rack up those big wins. Plus, seeing all those delicious treats on the reels makes it hard not to crave a snack. Just remember, CandyBlasted should be used for entertainment purposes only, and we can't be held responsible for any sudden urges to raid your kitchen cabinets.

meta.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
meta.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "CandyBlasted".

Please provide the following:

- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we like". (4 bullet points)
- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we don't like". (2 bullet pints)
- SEO optimized meta title with a maximum length of 45 characters. Include the words "play" and "free". Capitalize according to AP rules.
- SEO optimized, neutral meta description, explaining the review with a maximum length of 20 words. Include the words "play" and "free".

Respond with a JSON using the keys "pros" (simple array), "cons" (simple array), "meta_title" and "meta_description". 

Review:
 
Gameplay and Features

CandyBlasted offers an exciting gameplay experience, where players can indulge their sweet tooth while having the chance to win big. The game is played on a 10x10 grid filled with delectable candies that can lead to mouthwatering payouts. The game has a multiplier of up to 10x, and players can collect between 5 and 100 candies to increase their winnings. A unique feature of CandyBlasted is its Candy Planet Bonus, where players can land 12 free spins with a potential payout of up to 100x their initial bet for each spin.

Graphics and Design

CandyBlasted offers unique and delightful graphics and symbols that take players on an adventure through a universe filled with candy, sugar, and sweet treats. The game is designed with bright colors, vibrant graphics, and an intuitive interface, which makes it appealing and easy to play. The larger symbols, such as the pink square and red diamond, pay out the most, adding to the excitement of the game.

Special Symbols and Multipliers

CandyBlasted features special symbols and multipliers that can lead to significant payouts. Instead of the typical wild symbol, the star acts as a guiding light for players throughout the game. The Swirly Flamboyant Candy multiplier can increase your payout by 2x, 3x, 5x, 7x, or 10x, depending on the level of the multiplier. These multipliers are a significant feature of the game and can help players increase their winnings substantially.

Bonus Rounds and Free Spins

CandyBlasted's Candy Planet Bonus is a unique feature that offers players the chance to land 12 free spins with a potential payout of up to 100x their initial bet for each spin. This feature is triggered when players collect enough candies throughout the game. It's an exciting way to increase your winnings and is a fun feature that adds to the game's overall appeal. 

RTP and Overall Appeal

CandyBlasted may not be the easiest slot game on the market, but with its charm and simplicity, it can be a perfect choice for players looking to indulge their sweet tooth while having the chance to win big. The game has an RTP of 95.90%, which is in line with the industry average. Overall, CandyBlasted is an exciting and fun slot game that is worth trying out for those who are looking for a little bit of sweet magic.

CandyBlasted offers players a paradise where they can indulge in their sweet tooth while having a chance to win big. This online slot game, developed by High5Games, offers a multiplier of up to 10x and players can collect between 5 and 100 candies to increase their winnings. 

The graphics and symbols of CandyBlasted are unique and delightful, taking players on an adventure through a parallel universe. The game is played on a 10x10 grid covered in delectable candies that can lead to mouthwatering victories. Larger symbols, such as the pink square and red diamond, pay out the most. In a surprising twist, there is no typical wild symbol in CandyBlasted. Instead, a star acts as a guiding light for players throughout the game.

Gameplay is a fun surprise and easier to understand through playing rather than explanation. The goal is to group identical symbols to create successful combos that can lead to multiplying your winnings with multipliers like Swirly Flamboyant Candy, which can increase your payout by 2x, 3x, 5x, 7x or 10x. A significant feature for this game is the Candy Planet Bonus, which can land players 12 free spins with a potential payout of up to 100x your initial bet for each spin.

CandyBlasted may not be the easiest slot game on the market, but over time, players can come to appreciate its charm and simplicity. This game is not for those seeking mysterious adventures with hidden treasures, but rather for those who appreciate the sweet side of life. With an RTP of 95.90%, CandyBlasted is in line with the average online slot game and a game worth trying for those who are looking for a little bit of sweet magic.
